body_html: I believe this has to do with the legacy code not supporting reuse of a layer that's already been used. Since it's legacy I don't think anyone is actively working to fix these issues. See tf.contrib.seq2seq for a cleaner approach to seq2seq models.
body_text: I believe this has to do with the legacy code not supporting reuse of a layer that's already been used. Since it's legacy I don't think anyone is actively working to fix these issues. See tf.contrib.seq2seq for a cleaner approach to seq2seq models.
body: I believe this has to do with the legacy code not supporting reuse of a layer that's already been used. Since it's legacy I don't think anyone is actively working to fix these issues. See tf.contrib.seq2seq for a cleaner approach to seq2seq models.
